channel.title: Ubuntu on dumb by default
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on dumb by default

item.title: Ubuntu - Add Custom Package Vendors
item.description: Sometimes software vendors provides their own repository for specific releases. For instance qbittorrent latest releases might not be available on apt database, thus they provide ppa as an alternative for latest stable releases ppa:qbittorrent-team/qbittorrent-stable.
